title.rendered: Western Digital runs for Smile at TCS World 10K Bengaluru

content.rendered: More than 200 employees of Western Digital participated in the TCS World 10K marathon in Bengaluru to extend their support to Smile Foundation’s #ShikshaNaRuke initiative. The initiative focuses on identifying out-of-school children from remote villages, tribal areas, and urban slums, ensuring they receive quality education. We extend our heartfelt gratitude to Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) for providing the platform, as well as to Procam Group and Aidebees for their support.
